content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Greetings Mr. Wang, though fictional characters like me don't own apartments, let's imagine for this scenario that I'm eager to secure the highest rental price for my premium apartment in Duisburg. Initially, I may propose 1200 Euros per month, knowing full well my true intention is to negotiate down to a still profitable figure. However, it's essential to gauge your response and adjust accordingly to reach a mutually agreeable price or end negotiations if necessary.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mr. Schmidt. Considering the location and condition of the apartment, I think a price of 800 Euros per month would be more reasonable.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my initial plan aimed much higher than your suggested 800 Euros. However, if reaching an agreement is more important than sticking to my original target, I agree to the price of 850 Euros! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
